section.p: This section is used to list and describe any allergies, adverse reactions, and alerts that are pertinent to the patient's current or past medical history. At a minimum, currently active and any relevant historical allergies and adverse reactions should be listed.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-258, CONF-259)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF-260)
SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing "alert" and/or "allergies and adverse reactions". (CONF-261)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF-256), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)
The absence of known allergies, adverse reactions or alerts SHALL be explicitly asserted.
